original: Landberg, Anders Henrik Jakob, distriktsingenjör, Skara, f. 21/9/82 i Stora Tuna, Kopparb. 1., av skogsförv. Carl Magnus L. o. Hulda Dahlberg. G. 1. 10 m. Hedvig Thawenius, d. 19; 2. 20 m. Augusta Thawenius, d. 27; 3. 38 m. Magda Dahlberg. Barn: Carl-Anders f. 11, Anna-Greta 13, Nils-Erik 15, Birgit-EHsabet 17, Curt-Henrik 18. — Mog:ex. i Falun 01, dipl. fr. Poly-techn. i Zürich 05, underoff :ex. 06. Ing. v. Elektr. A-B Magnet i Ludvika 05-06, Westinghouse m. fl. firmor i USA 06-08, anst. v. Trollhätte kraftv. som konstr., förest, f. konstr :kont. o. tf. distr:ing. i Trollhätte drstr. 08-17, tf. distr :ing. i Skara distr. 17-18, ord. dito sed. 18. Led. av stadsfullm. (h.) sed. 21, dess v. ordf. samt led. av be-redn :utsk. 39, led. av drätselkamm. 23-27, av stadsrev, 33-38, dess ordf. 37-38, led. av lärov :utbyggn ilcomm., komm. f. utredn. av stadens lägg. under landsrätt, insp. f. Skara tekn. yr-kessk., huv:man o. rev. i Skarab. L. Sparbank, vattenrättsnämndeman, styr:led. i Skara högerfören. m. m. RVO.
translated: Landberg, Anders Henrik Jakob, district engineer, Skara, b. 21/9/82 in Stora Tuna, Kopparb. 1., son of forester Carl Magnus L. and Hulda Dahlberg. Married 1. Hedvig Thawenius in 1910, who died in 1919; 2. Augusta Thawenius in 1920, who died in 1927; 3. Magda Dahlberg in 1938. Children: Carl-Anders b. 1911, Anna-Greta b. 1913, Nils-Erik b. 1915, Birgit-EHsabet b. 1917, Curt-Henrik b. 1918. Completed Master of Science in Engineering at Falun in 1901, diploma from Polytechnic Institute in Zurich in 1905, non-commissioned officer examination in 1906. Employed at Elektr. A-B Magnet in Ludvika from 1905-1906, Westinghouse and other companies in the USA from 1906-1908, employed at Trollhätte power plant as a designer, head of design department, and acting district engineer in Trollhätte district from 1908-1917, acting district engineer in Skara district from 1917-1918, and regular thereafter. Member of the city council (conservative) since 1921, vice chairman and member of the preparatory committee since 1939, member of the finance committee from 1923-1927, member of the city auditor, 1933-1938, chairman, 1937-1938, member of the commission for the expansion of the school, committee for the investigation of the city's placements under the county court, inspector of Skara technical vocational school, chairman and auditor of Skarab. L. Savings Bank, water rights council member, board member of Skara Right Association, and more. RVO.

otherPositions.name: Commission for the Expansion of the School
